nodes.text: The Warstalkers were a legendary Trandoshan mercenary group based on the Trandoshan homeworld of Trandosha. The group would hire out their services to anyone, from foreign governments to criminal syndicates.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Warstalkers were first mentioned in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game supplement Allies and Adversaries. The clan originated in Star Wars Legends, where they first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 massively multiplayer role-playing game.
